# Benefit { #flood_adapt.objects.Benefit }

```python
objects.Benefit()
```

BaseModel describing the expected variables and data types of a Benefit analysis object.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

<code>[**name**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The name of the benefit analysis.

<code>[**description**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The description of the benefit analysis. Defaults to "".

<code>[**strategy**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The name of the strategy. Should be a strategy saved in the database.

<code>[**event_set**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The name of the event set. Should be an event set saved in the database.

<code>[**projection**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The name of the projection. Should be a projection saved in the database.

<code>[**future_year**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[int](`int`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The future year for the analysis.

<code>[**current_situation**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[CurrentSituationModel](`flood_adapt.objects.benefits.benefits.CurrentSituationModel`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The current situation model.

<code>[**baseline_strategy**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The name of the baseline strategy.

<code>[**discount_rate**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[float](`float`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The discount rate for the analysis.

<code>[**implementation_cost**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Optional](`typing.Optional`)\[[float](`float`)\]]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The implementation cost of the strategy. Defaults to None.

<code>[**annual_maint_cost**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Optional](`typing.Optional`)\[[float](`float`)\]]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The annual maintenance cost of the strategy. Defaults to None.
